PerfectNetExp.abs: 立即变得rapturous（狂喜的）当地土人皮肤scabrous（粗糙的）对他的入侵rancorous（憎恨的）
Herbs perennial , essentially glabrous , often scabrous at nodes and base of umbel ., 多年生草本 , 基本上无毛 , 通常粗糙在节上和在伞形花序的基部.

list.abs: her scabrous novels shocked the public ., 她的小说淫秽不堪 , 公众十分震惊.
... 无芒隐子草 awnless cleistogenes 糙隐子草 scabrous cleistogenes 芹叶铁线莲 longplume clematis.
a scabrous situation ., 棘手的情况.
The book includes some memorably seedy characters and scabrous description ., 这本书包含了一些难忘下流的角色及有伤风化的描述.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (first used to describe an author's style as 'harsh, unmusical, unpolished'): from French scabreux or late Latin scabrosus, from Latin scaber 'rough'

entry.tran: 色情的;猥亵的;淫秽的;有伤风化的
entry.def: If you describe something as scabrous, you mean that it deals with sex or describes sex in a shocking way.

example.ex: ...the scabrous lower reaches of the film business.

means.word_mean: 1. rough to the touch; covered with scales or scurf
2. dealing with salacious or indecent material;

auth_sentence.content: A once bewitching villa, now scabrous, awaits the knacker.
auth_sentence.res_content: A once bewitching villa, now scabrous, awaits the knacker.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A once bewitching villa, now scabrous, awaits the knacker.

auth_sentence.content: Guitarist Neil Griffiths provides a raw, scabrous energy; vicious wah'ed chords or anguished feedback swoops.
auth_sentence.res_content: Guitarist Neil Griffiths provides a raw, scabrous energy; vicious wah'ed chords or anguished feedback swoops.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Guitarist Neil Griffiths provides a raw, scabrous energy; vicious wah'ed chords or anguished feedback swoops.

means.word_mean: 困难的：难对付的；棘手的
